articles.title: Hugh Hefner’s iconic silk pajamas are up for auction

articles.content: Sorry, bunnies not included. Playboy pooh-bah Hugh Hefner’s iconic pipe, silk pajamas and smoking jacket are up for sale next week as items from the raunchy rebel’s personal collection go under the hammer in La La Land. Auction lots range from Hef’s personal … [+472 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Taiwanese reject legalizing same-sex unions in referendum
articles.description: Voters in Taiwan passed a referendum asking that marriage be restricted to one man and one woman, a setback to LGBT couples hoping their island will be the first place in Asia to let same-sex couples share child custody and insurance benefits.
articles.content: TAIPEI, Taiwan Voters in Taiwan passed a referendum asking that marriage be restricted to one man and one woman, a setback to LGBT couples hoping their island will be the first place in Asia to let same-sex couples share child custody and insurance benefits. … [+2253 chars]
